A young Jewish holocaust denier, posing as a believer, puts some hard questions to the senior curator of the Auschwitz State Museum. After making this video, a "hit" was put out on Cole, and a reward for information on his whereabouts was issued by Irv Rubin (who years later, was arrested by the FBI for planning to kill a Lebanese-American Congressman.) Fearing assassination, Cole went into hiding. He never surfaced again publicly. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xeG89gyV_LU
http://www.hugequestions.com/Eric/HoloHoax/DavidCole_Auschwitz.html
If even some Jews historians don't believe in the holocaust than it may be justified the question what was in the holocaust real and what is fabricated legend.
Why is not mentioned by the mainstream media that Auschwitz(however nowhere denied) had theater, film-theater, swimming pool and library for prisoners ?
Why the gas-chamber doesn't show Zyklon B residues but the building used for disinfection does ?
This are unpleasant questions for the Auschwitz expert who tries not to appear as holocaust denial(persecuted crime).
David Cole, being Jew, escaped from jail by putting this questions but gentiles putting the same questions have been jailed as holocaust denial criminals.
